channel.title: Help on safe zones
channel.description: Can you please tell me how to make specific zones safe zones cause like the starting place is wildy and i dont want it thanks.

item.title: Help on safe zones
item.dc:creator: @oobble oobble
item.description:
@oobble wrote:

Sorry man i looked for it its not there theres a lot of nonwild but no coordinates

Read full topic

item.title: Help on safe zones
item.dc:creator: @Loopget83 Loopget83
item.description:
@Loopget83 wrote:

Go into your client.java and search for nonwild scroll down and youll see these

(absX >= 1998 && absX <= 2017 && absY >= 4430 && absY <= 4449 ) ||

These Are What Those Numbers Mean
(absX >= NorthwestXCoord && absX <= SoutheastXCoord && absY >= SoutheastYCoord && absY <= Northeast Y Coord ) ||

After Its Done,It Should Look Like This

(absX >= 1998 && absX <= 2017 && absY >= 4430 && absY <= 4449 ) ||

So to sum it up,you go to the northwest corner of where you want the safe zone to start,fill out the thing i gave you above,then go to the southeast corner of where you want your Safe zone to be,then fill the thingy above again, And All In All It Makes A Box Of Safe Happieness,

Read full topic
